alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:43AM CDT until April 01 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Franklin County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 343 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Huntland, or 9 miles south of Winchester, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winchester, Decherd, Cowan, Sewanee, Anderson, St. Andrews and Sherwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central and northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
